CemUI

Easy-to-use, open source, game manager for the popular Wii-U Emulator, Cemu

About the project

CemUI is a GUI frontend and game manager for the WiiU emulator Cemu. It has features like maintaining your local game library, downloading new games and updates, and interact with the https://smmdb.net/ project to bring users Super Mario Maker courses without a Nintendo Network account. CemUI comes with 2 themes built in with support for making and using custom themes; Fluent which is based on Microsofts Fluent Design, and Flux, a sleek new design giving the UI a modern touch

CemUI is an Electron application written in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It uses a mix of a custom built API and the Nintendo private API for game metadata. Work on CemUI stopped in 2017 to give more of a focus on Pretendo, and as such is not a good example of my current code quality.
